root.description: A large room opens before you.

exit.description: To the east is another toughlit room.
exit.detailedDescription: Shouts can be heard through the doorway. "Maggolan arant hur!" "Gwu-tuli ara hur!"

exit.description: To the south, a stone stair leads to the dungeon.
exit.detailedDescription: The steps are wide and flat.

prop.description: A large, wooden table stands in the center of the room
prop.detailedDescription: The table is covered with an old cloth. Human teeth and paper cards are flung across it. It appears the goblins were engaged in some game of chance when you guide arrived.

prop.description: Four goblins lie dead about the table.
prop.detailedDescription: The hidious beasts are all cloven across the face. Two in a heap on the floor. The two nearest the door died before the could even rise from their chairs.

prop.description: On the table lie several human teeth.
prop.detailedDescription: In the teeth are carved strange runes.
The figures and writing on the cards are man-made but ancient.
